long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WA Auto Reply Sender allows you to automatically send a preset reply to messages from your WhatsApp contacts.

Transform the way you manage your WA communications with WA Auto Reply. Our innovative tool ensures that you never miss a message, providing timely and professional responses even when you’re busy or away.

Ideal For: Businesses, freelancers, and busy professionals who need to manage high volumes of messages efficiently. Perfect for customer support, lead generation, and event management, ensuring timely and professional responses around the clock.

# Features
✓ Send automated bulk WhatsApp Reply messages
✓ Set up automatic replies based on keywords
✓ Support for various attachment types including Image, Audio, Video and Document
✓ Support for dynamic message content
✓ Export message history for review
✓ Customize response intervals, effective date to fit your needs

# How to get started?
1. Open web.whatsapp.com, and scan to log in
2. Set up your response rules and messages
3. Just Activate the Bot and select an Auto Reply Item to turn on the switch, so simple.

# Additional Features
✓ Function Description: A brief description accompanied by a video tutorial demonstrating how to use this extension.
✓ Pro Version: Subscribe to or access premium features.
✓ Encountering an issue? Report it to us 💪: If you encounter any issues, you can email us at convertscc@gmail.com, and we will assist you in fixing them.

# Data Privacy
All the data you process is on your local computer and never passes through our servers. If you need to subscribe to our service, we will collect your email address to verify your subscription status. 

# Statement
The extension is designed to automate responses and reduce repetitive tasks. Please avoid using it for spamming, as excessive spamming may lead to your account being banned by WhatsApp.
